item.title: Apple's Final Cut Camera 2.0 to Support ProRes RAW and Genlock
item.description: Apple has announced Final Cut Camera 2.0, adding ProRes RAW recording and genlock sync support for the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max. The free app update makes Apple’s high-end iPhone 17 models
